ygData.subject: Re: Weapon selections..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I d strongly recommend Soinachie s Partisan, which is Damage 9, Delay 19, +6 CHA, +2 INT, SV Magic +5, and weighs in very light at 1.8.   It drops in
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 28 Aug 2000 10:00:59 +0200
> From: hho@...
>Subject: Weapon selections..


Well, I'd strongly recommend Soinachie's Partisan, which is Damage 9, Delay
19, +6 CHA, +2 INT, SV Magic +5, and weighs in very light at 1.8. It drops
in Karnor's Castle and is Bard only. It is LORE unfortunately so you can't
dual-weild two of them, but it can be weilded in either hand. I'm
currently using one of these in my primary hand and a Yak in my off hand.

Also, I think the Staff of Writhing is primary hand only.

Guess you're a battle bard too... hehe


Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 42 Missed Notes
E'ci



>Hi all,
>Well its time for me to call upon the experinced souls here to get some
>advice
>regarding weapons. I have the following weapons at my disposal:
>- Ebon Razor (Primary only) Damage 9, Delay 25, +4 fire, cold & magic prot.
> Wt.
>3.5.
>- Short Sword of the Ykesha: Damage 8, Delay 24, Weight 4.5. Effect of
>Ykesha
>(75 point direct damage spell)
>- Staff of Writhing 9/33 Diret proc Damage 48
>- Bladed thullian claws (Primary only). 5/19
>- Silvery War Axe 6/22
>Currently Im wielding the Ebon Razor and the yak and I think my damage is
>better
>than with the yak in primary and Silvery in off hand. But I have my doubts.
>Im
>not satisfied with the yak being placed in my offhand. Do any of you have
>suggestions for a better weapon setup?
>I have been thinking of getting a second yak, but I find the proc is
>resisted
>quite a lot by kunark mobs atleast.
>
>Regards
>Musiker(x) Silverdrum, bard of the 38th song, bertox
>
